subject: Soccer
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers’ won their sixth N.C.A.A. title by beating the Zips on penalty kicks, 3-2, even though Akron did not allow a goal during the tournament.
snippet: The Cavaliers’ won their sixth N.C.A.A. title by beating the Zips on penalty kicks, 3-2, even though Akron did not allow a goal during the tournament.
